Class EntityMentionDetector

    public abstract class EntityMentionDetector
extends AbstractModule
implements IDocumentProcessor
    The Class EntityMentionDetector - An instance can be created to support EntityMention output.

      • tryGetResult

        public Boolean tryGetResult(long requestId,
                            HltContentContainer hltContentContainer)
                     throws AdeptModuleException
        Description copied from interface: IDocumentProcessor
        This method is invoked multiple times as a polling mechanism to get the output from the asynchronous process method for a requestId. The boolean return type indicates whether the output is ready or not..
        Specified by:
